summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SwapFlow trading platform. Backend APIs are working excellently (95.7% success rate) with full CRUD operations for items, users, messages, and trades. Frontend loads correctly with proper authentication flow, responsive design, and protected route handling. Fixed critical ObjectId serialization issues in backend.

resolved_issues.issue: ObjectId serialization errors in item and message creation
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Added dictionary copying before MongoDB insertion to prevent _id contamination

integration_issues.issue: Session cookie authentication needs proper domain/path configuration for browser testing
integration_issues.workaround: Authentication works correctly via API, frontend properly redirects unauthenticated users

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Google OAuth button
Featured items display in Pinterest-style masonry grid
Protected routes correctly redirect to landing page when unauthenticated
Responsive design works on mobile and desktop
Item CRUD operations with category validation
Trade creation, confirmation, and rating system
User profile updates with username validation
